message.content: We'll create a dashboard for ultracontext. Lets do a POC first. Get the code under playground/3d-force-demo/ and copy it to a new dashboard folder to start off
Now adapt it to be used with ultracontext
I want one main context running. I starts flowing down. then after the 5th node, it spawns 2 subagents. On the left side I want a Log that shows in realtime new messages getting appended
